About MyBook Founded in March 2005 , MyBook is a social utility that helps people communicate more efficiently with their friends , family and colleagues . The company develops technologies that facilitate the sharing of information through the social graph , the digital mapping of people 's real-world social connections . Anyone can sign up for MyBook and interact with the people they know in a trusted environment . Which of these statements is correct ?
Why do n't we ask Jane to come over and talk ? She 's an ...
Choose the opposite of the word in bold . This company is loss-making .

Read the text and answer the questions . Hi , my name is Emily and I want to tell you about my family . My parents , my sister and I live in a small town in Cumbria , in the Northwest of England . My father works in a garage and my mother works in a school as a teacher . I 'm 14 years old and my sister is 13 years old . We go to the same school together with our two cousins Fred and Carol . They 're my aunt 's children . Fred is 13 years old and Carol is the same age as me . The four of us always visit our grandparents after school on Thursdays . They always give us some sweets or biscuits and then they tell us funny stories about our parents . We love them so much . I also have a nephew who is 2 years old . He is the son of my elder brother who moved to London several years ago with his girlfriend and their son . I do n't see my nephew that often , only once or twice a year . Well , I have to go now . Take care ! How old is Carol ?

SHELL PROFITS ALMOST DOUBLE The oil giant SHELL reports that its second-quarter profits have almost doubled after having completed a year-long corporate restructuring programme . The firm indicated profits of $ 4.5bn on a current cost of supplies basis , up from $ 2.3bn a year ago . This however was a drop from the $ 5.2 bn it made in the first three months of the year as it saw `` mixed signals `` in the world economy . Earlier this month , rival BP reported a record $ 17bn loss , which included a provision to cover the costs of its oil spill disaster in the China Sea . What is a synonym for `` mixed signals '' ?
If I _____ you , I would try to organise trade negotiations as soon as possible .
Personal pronoun Coche la bonne reponse . 3 . I need a favour . Can you phone mum and dad and tell ... that I 'm still at football training .
